title: Crime Alert  10.01.20
itunes:title: Crime Alert  10.01.20
description:
Perp uses a sawed off shotgun to rob an 80-year-old woman. Bloody guy walks into a police station to report killing his mother.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
